text: "Surrender" is a 1961 song by Elvis Presley and went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Belgium and the United States, number 2 in Norway and Italy, number 25 in Ireland, number 6 in Germany and number 3 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:1961 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Elvis Presley songs
title: Surrender (Elvis Presley song)
